control_attributes.control_description: The information system authenticates [Assignment: organization-defined specific devices and/or types of devices] before establishing [Selection (one or more): local; remote; network] connection using bidirectional authentication that is cryptographically based.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization requires that the registration process to receive an individual identifier be conducted in person before a designated registration authority.

Control Statement: The information system authenticates [Assignment: organization-defined specific devices and/or types of devices] before establishing [Selection (one or more): local; remote; network] connection using bidirectional authentication that is cryptographically based.
